revised_title: Dual Control of Hormone Synthesis and Release in Dogfish Pituitary
tldr: The study investigates the dual control of hormone synthesis and release in the pituitary gland of the dogfish Scylliorhinus stellaris. It examines the morphology and ultrastructure of the neuro-intermediate lobe, revealing that neurosecretory fibers innervate the intrinsic secretory cells, suggesting a dual control mechanism involving both type A and type B neurosecretory fibers.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Neurobiology and Endocrinology
